momentum.description: Strategies that exploit persistence in asset returns (winners keep winning, losers keep losing).

trend.description: Trend-following strategies that capture medium-to-long term moves using moving averages, breakouts, and filters.

meanReversion.description: Strategies that bet on price reversal after short-term extremes or dislocations.

macro.description: Strategies driven by macroeconomic indicators, central bank tone, rates, and FX/carry.

riskArb.description: Event-driven strategies exploiting corporate events, mergers, and relative value.

options.description: Strategies using options greeks, spreads, volatility surfaces.

commodities.description: Curve and spread-based strategies in energy, metals, and agriculture.

factors.description: Equity factor models (size, value, momentum, quality, low vol).

ml.description: Machine learning based strategies that adapt or generate new signals dynamically.
